channel.title: CelestialX - All New RSPS
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://forum.celestialx.com/public/style_images/4_logo5.png[/img] [u][b]Welcome to CelestialX[/b][/u]
A brand new RSPS that has been created by the players, for the players!
Website: [url=http://celestialx.com/]Website[/url] Forums: [url=http://forum.celestialx.com/]Forums[/url] Webclient: [url=http://celestialx.com/index.php/play/2014-05-08-12-52-45]Webclient[/url] Client: [url=http://www.celestialx.com/clientcache/CelestialX%20Beta%20V1.5.jar]Client Download[/url] Highscores: [url=http://celestialx.com/index.php/highscores]Highscores[/url] Vote: [url=http://celestialx.com/index.php/vote]Vote[/url] Donate: [url=http://celestialx.com/index.php/donate]Donate[/url]
[u][b]CelestialX Description:[/b][/u]
CelestialX is a brand new RSPS that has been designed by the players, for the players. We have active and experienced staff members working everyday to improve both the server and the forums for maximum enjoyment. Our server consists of caring and considerate staff members, an active and welcoming community, many bosses and minigames, and much more for you to find out!
[u][b]CelestialX Bosses/Raid Bosses:[/b][/u]
Ice Strykewyrms Tormented Demons King Black Dragon Giant Mole Nex Corporal Beast Dagannoth Kings Godwars Bork Kalphite Queen
[u][b]CelestialX Minigames:[/b][/u]
Duel Arena Pest Control Barrows Clan Wars Castle Wars TzHaar Fight Caves TzHaar Fight Pits Fist Of Guthix Soul Wars
[u][b]CelestialX Staff:[/b][/u]
Here at CelestialX we have a dedicated and supportive staff team. Our staff members work day after day on any tasks assigned to help improve and stabilize both the server and forums for maximum efficiency. We also have 'Information Advisors' which are specially selected users that have been chosen to help others because of their superior knowledge about CelestialX.
[u][b]Donator Bonuses:[/b][/u]
Access to the Donator Zone Donator only ::yell command Donator only events Donator only caves Access to the Donator shop Access to Chaos Altar for curses Access to Chaos Altar for special restore More to be added!
[u][b]Voting Bonuses:[/b][/u]
Abyssal Whip (Yellow) - 50 Points Abyssal Whip (Blue) - 50 Points Abyssal Whip (White) - 50 Points Abyssal Whip (Green) - 50 Points Gilded Armour Set (lg) - 100 Points Black Armour Set (lg) - 100 Points Agile Top - 20 Points Agile Legs - 20 Points Inferno Adze - 25 Points Mudskipper Hat - 10 Points Flippers - 10 Points Toy Horsey - 100 Points Easter Ring - 100 Points Ring of Stone - 100 Points Baby Monkey - 100 Points Rubber Chicken - 100 Points Easter Carrot - 100 Points Trollweiss - 100 Points Mouse Toy - 100 Points Candy Cane - 100 Points Fixed Device - 100 Points Golden Hammer - 100 Points Undead Chicken - 100 Points Scythe - 100 Points Lily of the Valley - 100 Points More to be added!
Thank you for taking the time to read our post. We at CelestialX hope that you take the time to join us and register, and become a part of our community. Fun awaits you, and it's just a click away![/center]

item.title: CelestialX - All New RSPS

[center]

Welcome to CelestialX

A brand new RSPS that has been created by the players, for the players!

Website: Website
Forums: Forums
Webclient: Webclient

Highscores: Highscores
Vote: Vote
Donate: Donate

CelestialX Description:

CelestialX is a brand new RSPS that has been designed by the players, for the players. We have active and experienced staff members working everyday to improve both the server and the forums for maximum enjoyment. Our server consists of caring and considerate staff members, an active and welcoming community, many bosses and minigames, and much more for you to find out!

CelestialX Staff:

Here at CelestialX we have a dedicated and supportive staff team. Our staff members work day after day on any tasks assigned to help improve and stabilize both the server and forums for maximum efficiency. We also have ‘Information Advisors’ which are specially selected users that have been chosen to help others because of their superior knowledge about CelestialX.

Thank you for taking the time to read our post. We at CelestialX hope that you take the time to join us and register, and become a part of our community. Fun awaits you, and it’s just a click away![/center]
